member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Testing.DialogTestClient
member.summary: A client to for testing dialogs in isolation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Testing.DialogTestClient.#ctor(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Dialog,System.Object,Xunit.Abstractions.ITestOutputHelper)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The dialog to be tested. This will be the root dialog for the test client.
(Optional) additional argument(s) to pass to the dialog being started.

An XUnit instance. See Capturing Output in the XUnit documentation for additional details. If this value is set, the test client will output the incoming and outgoing activities to the console window.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Testing.DialogTestClient.DialogTurnResult
member.summary: Gets the latest for the dialog being tested.
member.value: A instance with the result of the last turn.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Testing.XUnit.TestDataObject
member.summary: A wrapper class for XUnit test data that enables support for enumerating test cases in Test Explorer.
member.remarks: VS Test explorer only supports value types for data driven tests. This class implements and serializes complex types as json so the test cases can be enumerated and displayed into VS test explorer. This also allows the developer to right click on a particular test case on VS Test explorer and run it individually.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Testing.XUnit.TestDataObject.TestObject
member.summary: Gets a json string with the test data object.
member.value: The test data object as a json string.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Testing.XUnit.TestDataObject.GetObject``1
member.summary: Gets the test data object for the specified .Net type.
member.typeparam: The type of the object to be returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Testing.XUnit.TestOutputHelperEx.WriteAsFormattedJson(Xunit.Abstractions.ITestOutputHelper,System.Object)
member.summary: Writes a given object as formatted json.
member.param: An object instance to be written to the output as formatted json

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Testing.XUnit.XUnitOutputMiddleware
member.summary: A middleware to output incoming and outgoing activities as json strings to the console during unit tests.
